oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Launch of the ‘One Health Global Think-Tank for Sustainable Health & Well-being’ – 2030 (GHW-2030)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Laaser, Ulrich
Lueddeke, George
Nurse, Joanna
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Global Think Tank
Sustainable Health
Planetary Health
Wellbeing
Global Public Health
Planetary Health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The central mission of the GHW-2030 multi-sectoral think tank is to contribute to the implementation of the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by working toward achieving the education and health goals in cooperation with the Commonwealth Secretariat using an international interdisciplinary/multidisciplinary/transdisciplinary global One Health approach. A major focus of the think tank will be on the health and well-being – physical, emotional, aspirational – of children and young people particularly as these relate to their personal security, physical and emotional well-being, education and employment and the sustainability of life on the planet.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: South Eastern European Journal of Public Health (SEEJPH); Volume VI, 2016
South Eastern European Journal of Public Health (SEEJPH); Volume VI, 2016
